author: abrinke1
body:
New "ContentSigma" quality tests for L1T DQM, plus implementation in EMTF.  Flags noisy or dead bins in 1D or 2D histograms based on standard deviation from uniform distribution.
  * Follows PR #21459 
  * Based on branch from Chad Freer here
    - https://github.com/chadfreer/cmssw/tree/QT_pullReady+RefChi
    - Modified to be consistent with latest file versions in CMSSW_10_0_0_pre3
    - Removed some changes to config files
    - Why isn't @chadfreer linked to anything?  Does he need to be in some CMSSW group?
title: EMTF first PR for quality tests
